participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys expressing herself through her clothing choices and music preferences.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.name: Rahul
participant_2.personality: Passionate and dedicated, blends traditional and modern values in life, enjoys unique music.
participant_2.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
Why? So that you can respect me on the basis of my living?
I am an interior designer. What do you do?
I do kill the time. Untill time kills me
